Articles.Content:
**Shuttle M3** - It can carry a full orange tank into orbit, but needs a bit of skill to do so... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

*Flight manual and other details on KerbalX page:*

[http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2505](http://kerbalx.com/crafts/2505)

![U1cD0Pq.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/U1cD0Pq.jpg)
I've tried the shuttle on top of a rocket before, never turned out well for me the way I did it. Yours looks sick though. I like how you mounted the shuttle on top with the mounting quad.

WOOAH New take on a shuttle ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) Need rep dude, HAVE IT!!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I updated it, now it does a direct orbital insertion with a reusable booster... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

![fGhBAU8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/fGhBAU8.jpg)
